projects.title: PCA Analysis of Quasar UV Spectra
projects.subtitle: Astronomical Data Science & Spectroscopy
projects.description: Applied Principal Component Analysis to reconstruct full quasar continuum spectra from red-side spectral weights and reproduced mean transmitted flux vs. redshift relation.
projects.extendedDescription: Implemented advanced spectroscopic analysis techniques using Python with astronomical data processing libraries. Performed dimensionality reduction on high-resolution UV data to extract meaningful patterns from complex quasar spectra. Successfully reconstructed complete continuum spectra demonstrating mastery of both statistical methods and astrophysical data analysis.
projects.impact: Successfully reconstructed full quasar continuum spectra from partial spectral data using advanced PCA techniques

projects.title: Deming Regression Analysis of Tully-Fisher Relation
projects.subtitle: Bayesian Analysis of Galaxy Velocity-Luminosity Data
projects.description: Performed novel Bayesian linear regression analysis accounting for X and Y uncertainties in galaxy velocity-luminosity data, generating probability distributions for Tully-Fisher parameters.
projects.extendedDescription: Implemented sophisticated Bayesian regression techniques that properly account for measurement uncertainties in both dependent and independent variables. Successfully reproduced results from literature while extending analysis to early-type and late-type galaxy populations, demonstrating deep understanding of both statistical methods and galaxy physics.
projects.impact: Novel Bayesian approach accounting for bidirectional uncertainties, extending analysis to multiple galaxy populations

projects.title: NFL Data Analysis & Prediction
projects.subtitle: Machine Learning for Sports Analytics
projects.description: Developed **neural network** and **random forest** models to analyze and predict pivotal NFL plays with `75%+ accuracy`, processing `50,000+` plays using advanced ML techniques.
projects.extendedDescription:
Engineered comprehensive **feature extraction pipeline** for large-scale NFL dataset analysis.

### Model Performance

- **Fumble Prediction**: 78% accuracy using Random Forest
- **Formation Classification**: 82% accuracy (shotgun vs. non-shotgun)
- **Play Outcome**: 75% accuracy using Neural Network ensemble

### Technical Approach

```python
# Feature engineering pipeline
features = [
    'down', 'yards_to_go', 'field_position',
    'score_differential', 'time_remaining',
    'formation_type', 'personnel_package'
]

# Model ensemble
rf_model = RandomForestClassifier(n_estimators=100)
nn_model = MLPClassifier(hidden_layer_sizes=(128, 64))
ensemble = VotingClassifier([('rf', rf_model), ('nn', nn_model)])
```

### Key Insights

> Field position and down-and-distance were the strongest predictors of play outcome, while personnel packages significantly influenced formation classification accuracy.

**Correlation Analysis**: Identified unexpected relationships between weather conditions and fumble probability (~15% increase in adverse conditions).
projects.impact: Achieved 75%+ accuracy in NFL play prediction with feature extraction pipeline processing 50,000+ plays
